item.title: hfs_browser -- Midnight Sun CTF 2022 Quals
item.description: Solved with @jorge and @s3np41k1r1t0 ar Points: dynamic Solves: 20 TL;DR Find a UAF in the midnight() method for JS typed arrays Exploit the UAF to get a libc leak Exploit the UAF to perform a tcache poison attack Set __free_hook to system Free a chunk containing cat *la* Win The Problem We are given a tar file containing the following: hfs_browser - the binary libc-2.31.so, libcurl-gnutls.so.4.6.0" - libraries used remotely readme.
